11:51 <sabageru> vmassol: i did the research on AS queries yesterday and i have come to the conclusion that it is the best we can do, given the implementation. From EXPLAIN and the slides you gave me i found that the indexes placed on the table (only  the ones i have indicated) are the only ones necessary to speed up queries and not have a too big impact on the other operations. one thing i would suggest more would be to have a cleaner in the database in order to remove e

16:55 <+lucaa> gang, I might have asked this before but why aren't the parameter functions in the Block interface but in the AbstractBlock implementation?  
16:55 <+lucaa> since all the blocks should implement AbstractBlock anyway  
16:55 <+lucaa> ...  
16:56 <+lucaa> I find it a bit dirty that I have to cast to AbstractBlock to be able to get / set a parameter to a block
